channel.title: umbrella on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in umbrella on Barefoot Rob

item.title: saved an umbrella's life
item.description: 16:53 Tuesday 14 April 2015 JST For some reason I didn’t bring my umbrella today. It’s honestly not raining that much, but I’m in a suit, blah blah blah. Umbrellas are apparently the most often forgotten items and least claimed items in lost and founds. It’s common to see bundles of umbrellas being thrown away as the owners never came back to claim them from whereever they’ve accumulated. So,
